text: The Lamniformes (, from Greek lamna "fish of prey") are an order of sharks. They are commonly known as mackerel sharks. ==Further reading== * Compagno, Leonard (2002) Sharks of the World: Bullhead, mackerel and carpet sharks Volume 2, FAO Species Catalogue, Rome. . * ==Other websites== * elasmo- research Category:Sharks
title: Lamniformes
